page.title: 11 ROCK FERRY COUNCIL ESTATE
page.content: We live on the{Woodward Road Council {Estate, Rock Ferry. }The houses are quite old but have been renovated recently. They are{semi-detached. We have a front and back garden. We have five empty houses on our estate, Which have been boarded up. On the estate there is a small{playground. } It has no swings, they were taken down because they were dangerous, but it has a slide and a bridge to climb. We also have a lot of people around, most of them are my friends. My two {grandmothers}live in my road. They always sit in or outside our house. An{ice-cream van}comes round twice a day and I always get one. We have a local shop but the prices are high. We also have a{chip shop}and a{betting {shop. }
